description: Working with Lingshen, Satomi Hakase spends her days creating amazing technologies, some impractical! some genius! When the young scientist and her brainy cohort create a time-machine, a world of opportunity opens up at the perfect moment. Combining Negi`s magic and Satomi`s tech savvy, there may be a chance to correct one of the greatest tragedies to ever strike 2-A. It`s going to be risky, but Satomi`s research is sound! usually!
name: Hakase Satomi
